name: Striderbound 2.0 (Demo)
description:
Music: "Clockwork" by Clark Powell

2D Platformer rendition of my previous project, Striderbound. More information can be found on my YouTube page: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmoF0l-7TUGRzX6umeCLV5w

Right now there's not much to it, just mess around and have fun! You can refresh the page if you want another go at it.

Controls:

A&D: Move left and right

Spacebar: Jump

E: Flashstep

Left Click: Attack
